parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game version

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Smoothly conduct the changes that were assigned to a camera within the given time. If the time is set to zero, the changes are done immediately. For <tt>camPrepareXXX</tt> commands use [[camCommitPrepared]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camCommit''' time </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] - time in seconds during which the changes shall be done </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> '''[[sqs syntax|SQS]]'''<code>; create a camera object
_cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] [5600,4800,10]
_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]]
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "BACK"]
_cam [[camCommit]] 0

<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>;</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> smoothly move the camera to its new position in 6 seconds
_cam [[camSetPos]] [5680,4720,20]
_cam [[camCommit]] 6
@[[camCommitted]] _cam

<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>;</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> proceed</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> '''[[SQF syntax|SQF]]'''<code>[[private]] "_cam";

[[comment]] "create a camera object";
_cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[player]] [[select]] 0, [[position]] [[player]] [[select]] 1, 2];
_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "BACK"];
_cam [[camCommit]] 0;

[[comment]] "smoothly move the camera to its new position in 6 seconds";
_cam [[camSetPos]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[player]] [[select]] 0, ([[position]] [[player]] [[select]] 1) + 10, 20];
_cam [[camCommit]] 6;
[[waitUntil]] { [[camCommitted]] _cam; };</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[camCommitted]], [[camCommitPrepared]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
